name: Domain of Blessing: The Burning Gauntlet I
description:
It is said it was here that the sage in the form of a rainbow spirit once taught the warriors of the tribes the language of phlogiston. However, after the first Pyro Archon seized the authority of flame, the trials became unnecessary.
Drive out the squalid scoundrels occupying this place, and you may obtain the precious artifacts stored here.
disorder: When a character triggers a Pyro-related reaction on an opponent, a shockwave will be unleashed at the opponent's position, dealing True DMG. A shockwave can be unleashed this way every 5s.

rewardPreview.name: Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City
